name: 1dMarry
author: AFNI Developers
description: Joins together 2 (or more) ragged-right .1D files, for use with 3dDeconvolve -stim_times_AM2, or breaks up 1 married file into 2 (or more) single-valued files.

inputs.description: Input file(s) to be married or divorced.
inputs.name: Input files

inputs.description: Separator(s) for marrying files. The first character is used as the separator between values 1 and 2, the second character between values 2 and 3, etc.
inputs.name: Separators

inputs.description: Divorce mode: splits married file into separate files.
inputs.name: Divorce flag

output-files.description: Output file when marrying files. This file should be captured using a redirection such as '>'.
output-files.name: Output file
